overview: Yasmin Lander has dedicated her life to one goal – as her alter-ego Charlie Morgan she wants to become a Wrestling Champion. Ever since she was a teenager this is her only dream and now, in her mid-twenties, she is closer than ever to achieving it. But at what cost? Her girlfriend, her family, her day job and even her health – all these things are second to her ambition to archive the golden belt. And Yasmin has to fight in a male dominated environment inside and outside of the ring – for her recognition as an athlete, as a performer and as a woman.
title: Eye Candy
